title: ARAM ruined ranked play
body:
everyone now thinks its okay to die 10 times in a 30 minute game... this is feeding! you shouldnt die 10 times in any game ever

this has literally made ranked play boring. to many people feed so fast then rage at the rest of the team for dying over and over... how can we not die if you die 3 times in the first 4 minutes... you're now worth as much as a cannon... and the other team now has a 2 item lead on everyone in the game... 

if you have intentionally feeding as a way of reporting someone.... ENFORCE IT ALREADY!!!!!!!

replies.body:
...
No, I think I'll let this one stew...
